channel.title: EXIOBASE on Blog of Kai
channel.description: Recent content in EXIOBASE on Blog of Kai

item.title: Manual of EXIOBASE V3.8 updates
item.description: v3.8 was released in November 2020, provided with a full re-estimate of the time-series (to 2021) that heavily relies on “now-casting” economic structure (and environmental extensions).
